name: WowRevenue – Product Bundles, Upsell, Cross Sell, Buy X Get Y, and More!
author: WowRevenue

sections.description:
WowRevenue is a proven solution specially crafted to boost the WooCommerce storeâ€™s revenue by increasing the average order value. Its effective features like product bundle discounts, mix and match bundles, frequently bought together, buy x get y, etc., help you to start up-selling and cross-selling instantly. As a result, you can enjoy better revenue without increasing the number of customers.

Quick links

ðŸ‘‰ WowRevenue Pro: Unlock your revenue growth
ðŸ‘‰ Try Demo: Try WowRevenue for free
ðŸ‘‰ All Features: Explore all exclusive features

Boost Your Revenue with WowRevenue Campaigns

Normal Discount: Create discount offers for specific products and display them on other product and cart pages. So, with this campaign, you can upsell, cross-sell, and down-sell your desired items.

Frequently Bought Together: It is an advanced and effective way to cross-selling. You can recommend essential and related items for the main products using this campaign. So, the shoppers can purchase all or some of the products together as a bundle and get a discount.

Product Bundle Discount: This campaign allows you to create exclusive product bundles with or without the main products and offer discounts. So, the buyers will be interested in grabbing the bundle, and the order value will increase.

Mix & Match Bundle: It helps you to allow your customer to make their bundle from various product options and enjoy discounts. For example, you can offer them 2 products at a 20% discount and 3 at a 25% discount.

Volume / Quantity Discount: This campaign helps to offer discounts based on multiple quantities of the products, allowing you to increase bulk purchases.

Buy X Get Y: It is an effective campaign to increase the value of certain products. You can offer products at special discounts or for free by purchasing a specific product(s).

Want more campaigns?

We are continuously developing and improving the existing features and bringing new & effective campaign-creating options. Here is the list of upcoming campaigns:

  • Buy X Get Y Bundle (Coming Soon)
  • Double Order (Coming Soon)
  • Next Order Coupon (Coming Soon)
  • Spending Goal (Coming Soon)
  • Countdown Timer (Coming Soon)
  • Stock Scarcity (Coming Soon)

Increase Conversion with FOMO

WowRevenue also offers exclusive ways to create FOMO (fear of missing out) to ensure a better success rate. Be sure to check them out.

Animated Add to Cart: It animates the Add to Cart button to encourage the shoppers to add products to the cart sooner rather than later.

Countdown Timer: You can create limited-time discount offers and add a countdown timer. So the shoppers will feel they might miss the offer if they donâ€™t act now.

Free Shipping: Free shipping is a proven tactic to increase conversions and the average order value.

Placement Flexibility for Better Results

WowRevenue helps you create amazing offers and empowers you to control placement. The rest is up to you, explore the following opportunities and make the best use of them.

WooCommerce Pages: While creating a discount campaign, you can choose the page on which you want to display it.

Pop-Up: You can also showcase special offers in pop-up. It ensures that potential buyers see it and encourages them to grab it.

Floating: Displaying the offers in a sticky floating bar would increase engagement and ensure all visitors see offers.

Author

Developed by WPXPO. Contribute to Revenue on Bitbucket and join the party.

ðŸ“— Translations

Revenue plugin is compatible with WPML Plugin and also it works perfectly with loco translate plugin.
You can Translate Revenue on translate.wordpress.org.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.0.0 or greater
  • PHP version 7.3 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.6 or greater

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you donâ€™t even need to leave your web browser.

  1. Go to your WordPress Plugin installation menu (Dashboard > Plugins > Add New)
  2. In the search field type “Revenue” and press enter.
  3. “Install Now” and then click “Active”

Manual installation

For Manual installation, you download our product from WordPress directory uploading it to your web-server via your FTP or CPanel application.

  1. Download the plugin and unzip it
  2. Using an FTP program or CPanel upload the unzipped plugin folder to your WordPress installationâ€™s wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin from the Plugins menu (Dashboard > Plugins > Installed Plugins) within the WordPress admin.

Upgrading

Automatic update working great for this plugin. If you customize the plugin make sure to store a backup before update.

Sometimes because of the permalink issue during the plugin update, just go to WordPress > Settings > Permalinks and hit the â€˜Saveâ€™ button.
sections.faq:
Is WowRevenue easy to use for beginners?

Yes, WowRevenue is designed and developed in a way that both beginners and experts can use it with ease.

Do I need any coding knowledge to use WowRevenue?

No, you donâ€™t need any coding knowledge to use WowRevenue.

Will I get Support for WowRevenue?

Yes, we have a dedicated team for WowRevenue to provide on-demand support and assistance.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0 – 26 September 2024

  • New: Stable Release

1.0.1 – 9 October 2024

  • Fix: Animated Add to cart not working on Bundle Discount.
  • Fix: Fixed price not working on Buy X Get y.
  • Fix: Resolved the server-dependent parse error in the Product Mix & Match Campaign.
  • Fix: Resolved the trigger product auto required issue on Frequently Bought Together Campaign.
  • Fix: Resolved the conflict between server timezone and end user timezone for the countdown timer.
  • Fix: Automatically hide the countdown timer once it reaches zero.

  • Fix: Tooltip not visible perfectly issue

  • New: Offered Product Already On Cart action settings added

  • New: Pagination Added on Dashboard Most Performing Campaigns
  • Fix: Order History Analytics Data Not properly Issue Fixed
  • Fix: Multipes Bundle Product Create Issue Fixed
  • Fix: Attribute search not working Issue Fixed
